    • Field Detail

      • TRIG

        public static final GraphComponents TRIG

      • winBounds

        protected int[] winBounds
        The physical amount of pixels the window is wide and tall. The array will look like the following: (X, Y)

      • dispBounds

        protected double[] dispBounds
        The min and max x/y values used for display. Increasing them incrases the zoom level, and shifting them a certain direction shifts the "window" that direction.

        The array will look like the following: (min X, min Y, max X, max Y).

      • step

        protected double step
        The amount of lines that will be drawn. "step" is a bit of a misnomer, but I couldnt think of anything better.
